caption.p: Sensitivity analysis for climate-induced air pollution-related mortality in China

tr.td: Base results (current population and current baseline mortality rates)
Future population and current baseline mortality rates
Current population and future baseline mortality rates
Future population and future baseline mortality rates

fn.p: The estimated air pollution-related mortality is expressed as deaths per year due to climate change under RCP4.5 from current (2006 to 2010) to future (2046 to 2050) years. The base results assume no change in population and baseline mortality rates. We conducted further sensitivity analyses using future population and future baseline mortality rates.
